searchSql.baseSql:
<ifNotNull endTimeEnd> with wf as ( SELECT END_TIME_, W.CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW W INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST taskInst ON taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND taskInst.task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector') AND taskInst.ID_ = (SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ and DELETE_REASON_='completed' AND task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector')) ) </ifNotNull> select M.case_code,--aaa M.mort_type as MORT_TYPE_OLD, M.FIN_ORG_CODE, M.cust_name, M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT as mortTotalAmount, M.COM_AMOUNT as comAmount, M.PRF_AMOUNT as prfAmount, M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI, M.SIGN_DATE, M.LEND_DATE, M.APPR_DATE, M.LOAN_AGENT, M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM, M.IS_TMP_BANK as isTempBank, M.MORT_TYPE, M.CREATE_TIME, M.LOANLOST_APPLY_REASON
from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE c where c.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE and c.LOAN_REQ=1) AND M.is_active = '1'
<ifNotNull idflag> AND (M.LOAN_AGENT = #userId# OR EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE AND C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId#)) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND (M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM in (#queryorgs#) OR EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#))) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeStart> AND M.SIGN_DATE >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> AND M.SIGN_DATE <= #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull lendTimeStart> AND M.LEND_DATE >= #lendTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendTimeEnd> AND M.LEND_DATE <= #lendTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO TP where TP.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE AND TP.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull apprTimeStart> AND M.APPR_DATE >= #apprTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull apprTimeEnd> AND M.APPR_DATE <= #apprTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull realhtTimeStart> AND exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER where REAL_HT_TIME >= #realhtTimeStart# and REAL_HT_TIME <= #realhtTimeStart#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull endTimeStart> AND exists (select 1 from (select MAX(END_TIME_) as maxTime from wf) cwf WHERE cwf.maxTime>= #endTimeEnd# and cwf.maxTime<= #endTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull createTimeStart> AND M.CREATE_TIME >= #createTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull createTimeEnd> AND M.CREATE_TIME <= #createTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<if test="(transferTimeStart != null and transferTimeStart != '') or (transferTimeEnd != null and transferTimeEnd != '')"> AND exists (
SELECT LASE_APP_TIME FROM( SELECT MAX(END_TIME_) LASE_APP_TIME FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT with(nolock) INNER JOIN SCTRANS.ACT_HI_VARINST AV with(nolock) ON AT.PROC_INST_ID_ = AV.PROC_INST_ID_ AND AV.LONG_ = 1 AND AV.NAME_ =N'GuohuApprove'
WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'GuohuApprove' AND AT.DELETE_REASON_ = 'completed' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=(SELECT TOP 1 TW.INST_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW WHERE TW.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE AND TW.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND TW.STATUS in (0, 4)) ) W
WHERE 1=1 <if test="transferTimeStart != null and transferTimeStart != '' "> AND W.LASE_APP_TIME >= #transferTimeStart# </if> <if test="transferTimeEnd != null and transferTimeEnd != '' "> AND W.LASE_APP_TIME <= #transferTimeEnd# </if> ) </if>
<!-- <ifNotNull transferTimeStart> AND exists ( select TOP 1 V.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_VARINST V where PROC_INST_ID_=(SELECT TOP 1 TW.INST_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW WHERE TW.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE AND TW.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND TW.STATUS in (0, 4)) AND V.NAME_='GuohuApprove' AND V.LONG_=1 AND V.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ >= #transferTimeStart# AND V.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ <= #transferTimeEnd# ) </ifNotNull> -->
<ifNotNull comAmountStart> AND M.COM_AMOUNT >= #comAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull comAmountEnd> AND M.COM_AMOUNT <= #comAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull mortTotalAmountStart> AND M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT >= #mortTotalAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull mortTotalAmountEnd> AND M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT <= #mortTotalAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull prfAmountStart> AND M.PRF_AMOUNT >= #prfAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull prfAmountEnd> AND M.PRF_AMOUNT <= #prfAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<if test=' isTempBank=="是" '> AND M.IS_TMP_BANK = 1 </if>
<if test=' isTempBank=="否"'> AND M.IS_TMP_BANK = 0 </if>
<ifNotNull loanLostFinOrgNameCode> and exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FOCODE where FOCODE.FIN_ORG_CODE=m.fin_org_code and FOCODE.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE=#loanLostFinOrgNameCode#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull loanLostFinOrgNameYcCode> AND M.FIN_ORG_CODE = #loanLostFinOrgNameYcCode# </ifNotNull>
<if test=' isLose=="否" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1 and (M.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or M.MORT_TYPE ='30016002' ) </if> <if test=' isLose=="是" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=0 and (M.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or M.MORT_TYPE ='30016002' ) </if> <if test=' isLose=="公" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1 and M.MORT_TYPE='30016003' </if>
<ifNotNull processorOrgId> AND exists (SELECT 1 from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uj where uj.USER_ID=M.LOAN_AGENT and uj.real_name= #processorOrgId#) </ifNotNull>
<if test="organizeOrgId !=null and orgHierarchy == 'yucui_team' "> AND M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM = #organizeOrgId# </if> <if test="organizeOrgId !=null and orgHierarchy == 'yucui_district' "> AND M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM in (select id from sctrans.sys_org where PARENT_ID = #organizeOrgId#) </if> <if test=' loanType=="1" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1 and (M.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or M.MORT_TYPE ='30016002' ) </if> <if test=' loanType=="3" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=0 and (M.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or M.MORT_TYPE ='30016002' ) </if> <if test=' loanType=="2" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1 and M.MORT_TYPE='30016003' </if>

column.name: FIN_ORG_NAME_YC,FA_FIN_ORG_CODE
column.title: 贷款银行分行全称,贷款银行分行代码

column.name: PKID,ORG_ORG_NAME
column.title: 案件主键,贷款专员所属贵宾服务部

column.name: MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,COM_AMOUNT,PRF_AMOUNT,IS_TMP_BANK
column.title: 贷款总额(万元),商贷金额(万元),公积金金额(万元),临时银行

searchSql.baseSql: select M.case_code, M.FIN_ORG_CODE, M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI, M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT as mortTotalAmount, M.COM_AMOUNT as comAmount, M.PRF_AMOUNT as prfAmount, M.SIGN_DATE, M.LEND_DATE, M.APPR_DATE, M.CUST_NAME, M.mort_type as MORT_TYPE_OLD, M.LOAN_AGENT, M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM, M.IS_TMP_BANK as isTempBank from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE c where c.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE and c.LOAN_REQ=1) AND m.is_active = '1' <ifNotNull idflag> AND (M.LOAN_AGENT = #userId# OR EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE AND C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId#)) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND (M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM in (#queryorgs#) OR EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#))) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeStart> and m.SIGN_DATE >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> and m.SIGN_DATE <= #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>

column.name: FIN_ORG_NAME_YC,FA_FIN_ORG_CODE
column.title: 贷款银行分行全称,贷款银行分行代码
